sources.title: Ivan Vasylievich changes Occupation
sources.description:
An eccentric comedy based on the play by M. Bulgakov "Ivan Vasilyevich" about a time machine built by Moscow engineer Shurik Timofeev, with the help of which Ivan the Terrible ends up in the 20th century, and the house manager Bunsha, who is the spitting image of the tsar, ends up in Ancient Rus.

IMDb: 8.2

Year of production: 1973

Director: Leonid Gaidai
Screenwriters: Leonid Gaidai, Vladlen Bakhnov
Composer: Alexander Zatsepin
Cameramen: Sergey Poluyanov, Vitaly Abramov
Production designer: Evgeny Kumankov

Cast: Leonid Kuravlev, Yuri Yakovlev, Aleksandr Demyanenko, Natalya Selezneva, Natalya Krachkovskaya, Saveliy Kramarov, Natalya Kustinskaya, Mikhail Pugovkin, Sergey Filippov, Vladimir Etush

metadata.Plot: Shurik Timofeev builds a working model of a time machine. By accident, Ivan Bunsha, an apartment complex manager, and George Miloslavsky, a petty burglar, are transferred to the 16th century Moscow, while Tsar Ivan the Terrible goes into the year 1973.
metadata.Writer: Mikhail A. Bulgakov, Vladlen Bakhnov, Leonid Gaidai
metadata.Actors: Yuriy Yakovlev, Leonid Kuravlyov, Aleksandr Demyanenko
